Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) wheelchair

A $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) wheelchair consisting of a basic wooden or metal frame with a pair of handles, a place for the user to rest their feet, and a pair of large metal-rimmed wheels attached to the sides. It is of manual design with, meaning it is either pushed or pulled by someone or the user must propel themselves to move around.
